WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed as Rawr.Rogue has been completely reworked.
WorkItem.Description: Since I updated Rawr to the latest version, I cant find any of the ToC 10/25 trinket, even though the box for it is checked.
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] Missing Trial of the Crusader Trinkets and Ony10 weapons

Comments.Message: Rawr is not missing any items. Not all items (especially those with unusual special effects) are modeled in all models.
What Model are you using? What trinkets are you specifically looking for? Do you have all the Filters enabled?

I believe it may have to do with the item cache as I have been having this item issue with my rogue and weapons from Onyxia 10man. Even though I have the filters on to show Onyxia 10man weapons it just won't show the weapons.
Even after refreshing the item cache from WowHead it still wouldn't show.

You can manually add Items with the Item Editor, the button is in the bottom left hand side. If it STILL doesn't show, with ALL the filters active (except the ones that disable items, like the crafting ones and 'disable by iLevel') then we should look into that. Trinkets could easily be that the model isn't set up to support the specific trinket.

Weapons from Ony don't show up because the proc isn't modeled, so it doesn't have any relevant stats.  Trinkets, same thing.  I'm not surprised that rogue fits this bill, as we don't really have a rogue dev right now.
